DescribeSlowLog.document: This example shows you how to perform a slow log query.
DescribeSlowLog.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwpg.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeSlowLog
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwpg-54tsge58",
    "StartTime": "2025-03-10 12:12:12",
    "EndTime": "2025-03-25 16:12:12"
}
DescribeSlowLog.output:
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "d6ea55cc-1ddb-4c9f-99c9-ea7907cedacc",
        "SlowLogDetails": {
            "NormalQuerys": [
                {
                    "CallTimes": 1,
                    "ClientIp": "9.0.116.10",
                    "CostTime": 10403.899,
                    "DatabaseName": "evidev",
                    "FirstTime": "2025-03-25 12:07:49",
                    "LastTime": "2025-03-25 12:07:49",
                    "MaxCostTime": 10403.899,
                    "MaxElapsedQuery": "insert into row1 select * from row1;",
                    "MinCostTime": 10403.899,
                    "NormalQuery": "insert into row1 select * from row1;",
                    "ReadCostTime": 0,
                    "SharedReadBlocks": 0,
                    "SharedWriteBlocks": 0,

                }
            ],

        },
        "TotalCount": 1
    }
}

ModifyUserHba.document: This example shows you how to modify user Hba.
ModifyUserHba.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwpg.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyUserHba
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwpg-abcxxxxx",
    "HbaConfigs": [
        {
            "Type": "host",
            "Database": "all",
            "User": "all",
            "Address": "9.0.0.0/24",
            "Mask": "0",
            "Method": "md5"
        },
        {
            "Type": "host",
            "Database": "all",
            "User": "all",
            "Address": "0.0.0.0/0",
            "Mask": "",
            "Method": "md5"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyUserHba.title: Modifying User Hba
